snippet.textDisplay: wow that first goal was awful to give up. Zone marking is terrible as a set piece strategy I think. They had 10 defenders for 5 attackers and gave up a free header from 7 yards away in the middle of the 18 yard box. The second goal was not much better defending. The second olympiacos goal was a great cross and cool toe poke finish. wow, what an awful miss at the end of arsenal.

snippet.textDisplay:
4:14 And I quote " Horrible defending AGAIN. ARSENAL CANNOT DEFEND!!!. Crosses into their box, and they will not WIN things UNTIL THEY CLEAR UP THEIR DEFENSE DEFICIENCIES"

So, ladies,gentlemen, friends and a whole lot of enemies, there you we have it. RAW FACTS. So to my deluded enemies that would blame still blame Wenger, Emery, even Freddie Lumberg and now Arteta for the demise of this club, that was once great and now an empty shell of itself, is it not high time you realize that this self sustaining model rubbish is never going to win us things just like the commentator said?
snippet.textOriginal:
4:14 And I quote " Horrible defending AGAIN. ARSENAL CANNOT DEFEND!!!. Crosses into their box, and they will not WIN things UNTIL THEY CLEAR UP THEIR DEFENSE DEFICIENCIES"

snippet.textDisplay: That's a shithouse goal from us... not Auba's finishing, that's class. I'm just talking about the creation, look at it again, Ozil just whips it, to NOBODY it seems because Martinelli isn't beating a bigger CB to it... it flies up in the air and there's Auba. He's in a good goal scorers spot, but think about that... we let go of Emery because this is the type of shite he pulled, just whipping aimless crosses into the box and now, we're back to the same. And I don't blame Arteta, he's not at fault for this, but it seems given the personnel, this is the best plan of attack because our midfield sucks ass and can't control games or push the ball. So naturally we have to play the width and whips balls in for shithouse goals...
snippet.textOriginal: That's a shithouse goal from us... not Auba's finishing, that's class. I'm just talking about the creation, look at it again, Ozil just whips it, to NOBODY it seems because Martinelli isn't beating a bigger CB to it... it flies up in the air and there's Auba. He's in a good goal scorers spot, but think about that... we let go of Emery because this is the type of shite he pulled, just whipping aimless crosses into the box and now, we're back to the same. And I don't blame Arteta, he's not at fault for this, but it seems given the personnel, this is the best plan of attack because our midfield sucks ass and can't control games or push the ball. So naturally we have to play the width and whips balls in for shithouse goals...

snippet.textDisplay: As an idiot, I had to watch the game over... I regret it. We deserved to lose from the get go. We were not up for it and that's a worrying trend over the last 4 seasons. Moments like this seem to pass the players, it used to be back with the likes of Cazorla, Giroud, Mertesacker, Kos and some of the other old guard they weren't the best but, "cometh the moment, cometh the man,"... this group? Fack me are they cowardly. They hide, Lacazette and other super star paid players are frauds. Nah we need a rebuild badly, the personalities here have to go, they're the problem.
snippet.textOriginal: As an idiot, I had to watch the game over... I regret it. We deserved to lose from the get go. We were not up for it and that's a worrying trend over the last 4 seasons. Moments like this seem to pass the players, it used to be back with the likes of Cazorla, Giroud, Mertesacker, Kos and some of the other old guard they weren't the best but, "cometh the moment, cometh the man,"... this group? Fack me are they cowardly. They hide, Lacazette and other super star paid players are frauds. Nah we need a rebuild badly, the personalities here have to go, they're the problem.
